basics.name: Emmanuel Milou
basics.label: Software Engineer, Technical Lead
basics.summary: I have 10+ years experience as a Free software consultant, developer and technical lead. My technical background goes from embedded and C development to web applications, content management systems, APIs development and CI/CD pipelines implementation. I was team manager and technical lead in our web development department (up to 25 developers) for several years. I am looking to have a positive impact in a position that will provide both inspiring human interactions and interesting technical challenges.

highlights: Streamlined testing and delivery processes among the different stack teams
Helped on and reviewed projects estimates produced by the developers
Engaged a Devops transition among the Web department (~30 persons)
Developed collaboration in a distributed team
Evangelized best software development practices and open-source contributions
Interacted with local open-source communities to organize coding events
Drafted many Request For Proposals responses, in Drupal and web-related
Collaborated with HR department to scale up the team
Proudly ranked 13th at the Applied Security Event NorthSec in 2017 (on 40 teams)
Collaborated with the team in Paris on a Request for Proposals for Paris-Dauphine university. Contract won: http://my.dauphine.fr.
Acted successfully as project manager and architect in numerous projects
Built a skillful team of Drupal experts (up to 5 backend developers)
Designed Drupal development and deployment processes used among the team for clients projects
Initiated a fair development program to help non-profit organization with their IT needs
Architected and developed the new portal of Polytechnique school (http://polymtl.ca)
Acted as Ring (formerly SFLphone) Scrum Master
Worked on the open-source R&D project Ring (formerly SFLphone)
Worked as embedded Linux developer in an international leader in high performance digital imaging (TeleDyne Dalsa)
Developed the high-traffic Portable North Pole platform
Trained professionals to use LAMP stack
Certified as Professional Scrum Master (Pyxis)
Audited internal processes as member of the auditors team (ISO 9001)

education.institution: Society of Arts and Technology, Montreal

education.studyType: Department of Computer Science and Operations Research (Student Exchange)

publications.name: Various hacknights and code sprints organizer for the Sous-Chef project
CI/CD in a Drupal multisite environment
